Subskills.name: Neurotoxin
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using poison breath.

Subskills.name: Aerial Fumes
Subskills.description: Increases the size of poison breath.

Subskills.name: Acid Spit
Subskills.description: Spew out multiple poison projectiles exploding into acid novas inflicting increased poisoned damage.

Subskills.name: Contamination
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to chain an additional breath from the target to its closest monster.

Subskills.name: Acid Components
Subskills.description: Dissolve low life monsters into pools of acid dealing additional damage and slowing on hit.

Subskills.name: Poisonous Gas
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to poisoned targets.

Subskills.name: Vile Bacteria
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict poison break.

Subskills.name: Plague Breath
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple breaths in an arc dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Toxic Lungs
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by poison breath.

Subskills.name: Necrotic Intellect
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of poison breath.

Subskills.name: Necrotic Ward
Subskills.description: Chance to spawn a necrotic ward on hit unleashing poison breath towards the nearest monster for a short period.

Subskills.name: Bio Hazard
Subskills.description: Increases the size of poison breath on hit.

Subskills.name: Necrotic Tongue
Subskills.description: Increases the length of poison breath inflicting poison break and dealing increased damage.
